text: The Women's 5 kilometre cross-country skiing event was part of the cross- country skiing programme at the 1988 Winter Olympics, in Calgary, Canada. It was the seventh appearance of the event. The competition was held on 17 February 1988, at the Canmore Nordic Centre. ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" ! Rank !! Name !! Country !!
